includedAssets.title: The Calm
includedAssets.synopsis: Crime in Starling City is at an all-time low as season three begins, but Oliver would be wise not to let his defences down.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Crime in Starling City is at an all-time low as season three begins, but Oliver would be wise not to let his defences down.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Crime in Starling City is at an all-time low as season three begins, but Oliver would be wise not to let his defences down.

includedAssets.title: Sara
includedAssets.synopsis: Still reeling from the death of one of their own, Oliver and the gang draw up a list of suspects before taking on a new arrival in town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Still reeling from the death of one of their own, Oliver and the gang draw up a list of suspects before taking on a new arrival in town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Still reeling from the death of one of their own, Oliver and the gang draw up a list of suspects before taking on a new arrival in town.

includedAssets.title: Corto Maltese
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver tries to persuade his sister Thea to come home, while Diggle tracks down an A.R.G.U.S. agent who has 'gone dark'.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oliver tries to persuade his sister Thea to come home, while Diggle tracks down an A.R.G.U.S. agent who has 'gone dark'.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver tries to persuade his sister Thea to come home, while Diggle tracks down an A.R.G.U.S. agent who has 'gone dark'.

includedAssets.title: The Magician
includedAssets.synopsis: Nyssa returns to Starling City to find out what happened to Sara, followed by the big reveal of her father.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nyssa returns to Starling City to find out what happened to Sara, followed by the big reveal of her father.

includedAssets.title: The Secret Origin Of Felicity Smoak
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep5 - The Secret Origin Of Felicity Smoak
includedAssets.synopsis: Flashbacks shed light on Felicity's past when Starling City is brought to its knees by a cyber attack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Flashbacks shed light on Felicity's past when Starling City is brought to its knees by a cyber attack.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Flashbacks shed light on Felicity's past when Starling City is brought to its knees by a cyber attack.

includedAssets.title: Guilty
includedAssets.synopsis: Trouble looms for Ted when a dead body is discovered in the Wildcat gym. Flashbacks shed light on Oliver's A.R.G.U.S. assignment, too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Trouble looms for Ted when a dead body is discovered in the Wildcat gym. Flashbacks shed light on Oliver's A.R.G.U.S. assignment, too.

includedAssets.title: Draw Back Your Bow
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep7 - Draw Back Your Bow
includedAssets.synopsis: Arrow meets his number-one fan, Carrie Cutter, who takes obsession to a new level. Plus, Felicity joins Ray for dinner.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Arrow meets his number-one fan, Carrie Cutter, who takes obsession to a new level. Plus, Felicity joins Ray for dinner.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Arrow meets his number-one fan, Carrie Cutter, who takes obsession to a new level. Plus, Felicity joins Ray for dinner.

includedAssets.title: The Brave And The Bold
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep8 - The Brave And The Bold
includedAssets.synopsis: The Flash whizzes to Starling City as Oliver and the gang continue the search for Digger Harkness.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Flash whizzes to Starling City as Oliver and the gang continue the search for Digger Harkness.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Flash whizzes to Starling City as Oliver and the gang continue the search for Digger Harkness.

includedAssets.title: The Climb
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver receives an ultimatum from Ra's al Ghul: he has 48 hours to find Sara's killer, or else the League of Assassins will attack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oliver receives an ultimatum from Ra's al Ghul: he has 48 hours to find Sara's killer, or else the League of Assassins will attack.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver receives an ultimatum from Ra's al Ghul: he has 48 hours to find Sara's killer, or else the League of Assassins will attack.

includedAssets.title: Left Behind
includedAssets.synopsis: Concerns grow for our missing hero, a turn of events a ruthless gangster uses to his advantage. Vinnie Jones guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Concerns grow for our missing hero, a turn of events a ruthless gangster uses to his advantage. Vinnie Jones guest stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Concerns grow for our missing hero, a turn of events a ruthless gangster uses to his advantage. Vinnie Jones guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Midnight City
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver tries to restore law and order, starting with gangster Brick (guest star Vinnie Jones). Plus, Laurel spreads her wings.

includedAssets.title: Uprising
includedAssets.synopsis: Team Arrow contemplate an unlikely alliance in order to take down Brick. Flashbacks shed light on Malcolm's descent, too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Team Arrow contemplate an unlikely alliance in order to take down Brick. Flashbacks shed light on Malcolm's descent, too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Team Arrow contemplate an unlikely alliance in order to take down Brick. Flashbacks shed light on Malcolm's descent, too.

includedAssets.title: Canaries
includedAssets.synopsis: Vertigo (guest star Peter Stormare) returns and, not afraid to ruffle a few feathers, he hits Laurel with a full dose of his drug.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Vertigo (guest star Peter Stormare) returns and, not afraid to ruffle a few feathers, he hits Laurel with a full dose of his drug.

includedAssets.title: The Return
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver and Thea find themselves on the island of Lian Yu, where a warm welcome awaits in the form of arch-nemesis Deathstroke.

includedAssets.title: Nanda Parbat
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver heads to Nanda Parbat, where Ra's al Ghul is looking to exact his revenge on Malcolm. Plus, Ray suits up.

includedAssets.title: The Offer
includedAssets.synopsis: While Oliver takes on a new villain, Michael Amar, or, Murmur, Laurel contemplates an interesting offer from Nyssa.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Honeymoon cut short, Diggle and Lyla are thrown into the Suicide Squad's latest mission. Oliver and Ray clash, too.

includedAssets.title: Public Enemy
includedAssets.synopsis: When Ray is injured during an attack on the Mayor's office, Oliver and co try to find the culprit before the police do.

includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver reluctantly reaches out to Ray for help when latest foe Deathbolt (guest star Doug Jones) makes his presence known.

includedAssets.synopsis: The team return to Nanda Parbat when Ra's al Ghul makes Oliver an offer. Felicity, meanwhile, takes matters into her own hands.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team return to Nanda Parbat when Ra's al Ghul makes Oliver an offer. Felicity, meanwhile, takes matters into her own hands.

includedAssets.title: Al Sah-him

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver undergoes a rigorous transformation and, in Starling City, the League of Assassins track down a visiting Nyssa.

includedAssets.title: This Is Your Sword
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep22 - This Is Your Sword

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver comes into conflict with a legendary DC villain as publicity around his heroics begins to build. Thrilling third season of comic book action.

includedIn.title: Arrow
includedIn.synopsis: After five years stranded on a desert island, billionaire playboy Oliver Queen returns to Starling City to battle evil as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow and arrow.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Armed with a bow and arrow, hooded vigilante and billionaire playboy Oliver Queen fights crime on the streets of Starling City.
